title: I GOT LEVEL 3 HONOUR, BUT NEED HELP
body: So I just got a level 3 honour, said something about non premade or 2 premade to show off my flair on the loading screen, but clicked OK before actually reading it. So what can I do now?

replies.body: Just as you said! If you get 1 honor from a random teammate or 2 honors from a premade, in the very next loading screen you'll have an Honor Flair showing your current [**Honor Rank**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/honor). You also now have the chance to get the end of season honor rewards and Honor Capsules instead of key fragments.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=P7zbxP4w,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-31T01:54:40.699+0000)
>
> Just as you said! If you get 1 honor from a random teammate or 2 honors from a premade, in the very next loading screen you'll have an Honor Flair showing your current [**Honor Rank**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/honor). You also now have the chance to get the end of season honor rewards and Honor Capsules instead of key fragments.

Wait wait wait, I am going to lose out on key fragments because I am honor 3 and not honor 2?! 

I do not like this. I do not like this Broporo.
I do not like this on the Rift. I do not like this on Abyss. I do not like losing key fragments for being honorable @Broporo !
Pssssst, [**Honor Capsules**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/honor) have 2 key fragments in them....

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=P7zbxP4w,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2017-08-03T21:37:41.874+0000)
>
> Pssssst, [**Honor Capsules**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/honor) have 2 key fragments in them....

The Honor page seems to be broken!
Does this this mean that Honor Capsules aren't going to give "extra" Key Fragments? Previously, I thought I would be able to earn twelve Key Fragments per month plus some extras from Honor Capsules. Is this not the case?
Sooooo you can get up to 12 key frags normally, and the fragments from Honor Capsules are able to push you over that limit AFAIK.
